ygData.subject: Re: General new observations from a level 13 wiz
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to ... I am not using my most powerful spell as soon as I got It I m level 13 now...  next?  Oh and I know all the tricks to wait and such... but you also
ygData.messageBody:
>
> You won't see any major difference in dmg until lvl 29+... then we begin
to
> shine. And another thing, you DO NOT use your most power spell as soon as
> you reach that lvl for it. Sit back and throw your previous most powerful
> spell at the baddies and they won't come at you.
>

I am not using my most powerful spell as soon as I got It I'm level 13
now... next? Oh and I know all the tricks to wait and such... but you also
want to help as much as you can... I have found there is a find line... cast
once to start off... then again after about 3 seconds... then wait for about
5 seconds... if the battle is still a long way from finishing usually my
tanks are not doing so well so I have to go heavy and dump into the mob, if
they are doing well I watch to try to finish... I also know about rooting
if the Mob runs... believe me I know most of the tricks... chuckle. So
even though our only benefit is that we are damage doers we have to wait
till 29th?

Rutreeii
Cazic-Thul
